description: Adds support for loading RetryMaxAttempts and RetryMod from the environment and shared configuration files. These parameters drive how the SDK's API client will initialize its default retryer, if custome retryer has not been specified. See [config](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/config) module and [aws.Config](https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/aws/aws-sdk-go-v2/aws#Config) for more information about and how to use these new options.
